data.eml:eml: Notes on black elytron species of Pyrrhalta Joannis and the description of a new species from China (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nie, Rui-E, Zhou, Da-Kang, Xue, Huai-Jun, Yang, Xing-Ke (2013): Notes on black elytron species of Pyrrhalta Joannis and the description of a new species from China (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae). ZooKeys 289: 41-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.4266, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.4266
